danielmiessler /

      SecLists---SecLists is the security tester's companion. It's a collection of multiple types of lists used during security assessments, collected in one place. List types include usernames, passwords, URLs, sensitive data patterns, fuzzing payloads, web shells, and many more.

JetBrains /

      compose-jb---Jetpack Compose for Desktop and Web, a modern UI framework for Kotlin that makes building performant and beautiful user interfaces easy and enjoyable.

actions /

      virtual-environments---GitHub Actions virtual environments

crater-invoice /

      crater---Open Source Invoicing Solution for Individuals & Businesses

acmenlt /

      dynamic-threadpool---🔥 强大的动态线程池，附带监控报警功能（没有依赖中间件），完全遵循阿里巴巴编码规范。Powerful dynamic thread pool, does not rely on any middleware, with monitoring and alarm function.

rd2coding /

      Road2Coding---编程之路

FarbstoffRSL /

      RSL-Helper---Der Farbstoff RSL-Helper

appsmithorg /

      appsmith---Low code project build any custom business software like admin panels, internal tools, and dashboards. Use 35+ pre-built UI widgets that connect to any database, GraphQL or REST API. Write all logic in Javascript.

skydoves /

      android-developer-roadmap---🗺 Android Developer Roadmap 2022 suggests learning paths to understanding Android development.

AsyncBanana /

      microdiff---A fast, zero dependency object and array comparison library. Significantly faster than most other deep comparison libraries and has full TypeScript support.

ethereum /

      consensus-specs---Ethereum Proof-of-Stake Consensus Specifications

kholia /

      OSX-KVM---Run macOS on QEMU/KVM. With OpenCore + Big Sur + Monterey support now! Only commercial (paid) support is available now to avoid spammy issues.

mpcabete /

      bombcrypto-bot---This is a python bot that automatically logs in, clicks the new button, and sends heroes to work in the bombcrypto game. It is fully open source and free.

thunlp /

      WantWords---An open-source online reverse dictionary.

FerretDB /

      FerretDB---A truly Open Source MongoDB alternative

kon9chunkit /

      GitHub-Chinese-Top-Charts---🇨🇳 GitHub中文排行榜，帮助你发现高分优秀中文项目，无语言障碍地、更高效地吸收国人优秀经验成果；榜单周更，敬请关注！

argyleink /

      open-props---CSS custom properties to help accelerate adaptive and consistent design.

ruanyf /

      weekly---科技爱好者周刊，每周五发布

      explore---Community-curated topic and collection pages on GitHub

microsoft /

      dotnet-podcasts---.NET 6 reference application shown at .NET Conf 2021 featuring ASP.NET Core, Blazor, .NET MAUI, Microservices, and more!

Mas0nShi /

      typoraCracker---A extract & decryption and pack & encryption tools for typora.

      elixir---Elixir is a dynamic, functional language designed for building scalable and maintainable applications

      folly---An open-source C++ library developed and used at Facebook.
